title: Rekia Boyd and the Chicago Police Department's International Reign of Terror, Part 2
itunes:title: Rekia Boyd and the Chicago Police Department's International Reign of Terror, Part 2
description:
Christopher Wong continues his conversation with Raven about the Chicago police and how they weaponize tensions between ethnic and immigrant groups to maintain their hold on power.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
